messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: Donald in Mathmagicland in New York and Massa...
messages.msgSnippet: ** It  is a free 3-day loan only - and only to teachers with a school address. Darn.** I would think at least some public libraries would have this video,
messages.messageBody:
**

It is a free 3-day loan only - and only to teachers with a "school
address."
Darn.**

I would think at least some public libraries would have this video, especially since it's intended to be "educational". (I didn't find any copies on Ebay.)

Betsy

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: Donald in Mathmagicland in New York and Massa...

Sandra
